attributes.action: The DWP should release the figures for introducing Universal Credit
attributes.additional_details: It was reported by the BBC before the election that the National Audit Office had asked the DWP to release these figures and they refused.  The NAO then asked a judge to ask the DWP to release these figures and again they refused.
attributes.background: Prior to the 2015 General Election, the DWP said that the cost for bringing Universal Credit would have to be kept under lock and key until after the Election.  The DWP should release these figures NOW.
